content: reach for the stars and your crochet hook with this star-shaped crochet pillow stitched in bernat baby blanket and bernat baby blanket sparkle pattern features single_crochet simple increases reverse single_crochet crab stitch and more we love the fresh colors shown but the pattern would be equally enchanting in any shades you choose for your version it s a great addition to the kids room or nursery materials stuffing
